title: Rebooting for the Sequel
goal: Establish a new status quo and set the long-term quest to reach the Server Room.
stakes_shift: Artie is no longer just a player; he has become a multiversal virus and the most wanted entity in the game.

bridge.from_prev: Artie and Fizz wake up in the Null-Zone after the reality crash.
bridge.to_next: Artie joins the Beta-Tester resistance to begin the quest for the Source Code.

sections.title: The New Normal
sections.intent: Establish the new status quo for Artie and Fizz in the Null-Zone.

scenes.summary: Artie learns how to eat 'Data-Packets' instead of food.
scenes.outcome: Artie adapts to his new existence.

scenes.summary: Fizz explains that the only way to save the world is to reach the 'Server Room' at the center of the world.
Artie tests his 'NaN' HP by jumping off a cliff; he doesn't die, he just clips through the floor and ends up back at the top.
scenes.outcome: Artie realizes his immortality is as glitchy and annoying as his 1 HP build.
scenes.end_condition_echo: Artie realizes his immortality is as glitchy and annoying as his 1 HP build.

sections.title: The Resistance
sections.intent: Introduce the Beta-Tester faction and the long-term goal.

scenes.summary: A group of 'Beta-Testers' led by Zero finds Artie in the Null-Zone.
scenes.outcome: Artie finds allies who know the world's secrets.

scenes.summary: Zero reveals that Vane is still alive and has been 'upgraded' by the System to be a 'Patch-Hunter'.
scenes.outcome: The rivalry continues with higher stakes.

scenes.summary: Artie receives his first 'Legendary' quest: 'Delete the Admin'.
scenes.outcome: The series quest to 'Delete the Admin' is officially locked in.
scenes.end_condition_echo: The series quest to 'Delete the Admin' is officially locked in.

sections.title: The First Step
sections.intent: End on a high note of action and anticipation for the sequel.

scenes.summary: Artie, Fizz, and Zero prepare to leave the Null-Zone and head to the 'Glitch-Woods'.
Artie looks at the sky and says, 'I hope the next world has better drop rates,' before stepping into a portal.
scenes.outcome: Artie steps into a portal to the Glitch-Woods, ending Book 1.
scenes.end_condition_echo: Artie steps into a portal to the Glitch-Woods, ending Book 1.
